tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE 5g_service_metrics (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  service_type VARCHAR(255),
  performance_metric_1 DECIMAL,
  performance_metric_2 DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE SLA ( 
sla_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
client_id INT, 
service_name VARCHAR(50), 
agreement_date DATE, 
sla_terms TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics ( 
metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
service_id INT, 
metric_name VARCHAR(50), 
value FLOAT, 
timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE 5g_service_agreements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT NOT NULL,
    agreement_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    sla_description TEXT,
    sla_metric TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE 5g_performance_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_id INT NOT NULL,
    metric_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    metric_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
    measurement_unit TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    service_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ServiceLevelAgreements (
    sla_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    agreed_response_time INT
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    latency_ms INT,
    throughput_mb INT
);
